# PED::SET_PED_RELATIONSHIP_GROUP_HASH

## Summary
Sets a ped into a relationship group

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **REL_GROUP_HASH** relGroup

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Sets the peds relationship group to the one passed
